DOC.brief_summary: Obese HIV-positive woman Metabolic Syndrome ( HIV-MS ) obese HIV-negative woman Metabolic Syndrome study achieve moderate ( 6 % -8 % ) diet-induced weight loss . The investigator hypothesize health marker improve group improvement blunt woman HIV-MS .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Diet-induced Weight Loss HIV-associated Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Sedentary Obese Have either dyslipidemia ( HDL < 50 triglyceride > 150 ) , waist circumference > 88cm , impair glucose tolerance homeostasis model assessment value > 3 Subjects HIVMS must receive HAART > 6 month Medication change last 3 month Diabetes mellitus Medical problem opinion principal investigator may interfere patient safety Substance abuse
